title: Red Car Long Legs: Adventures in California and Beyond
description: Jennylynd James is an author, an artist and a singer. To add balance to this triple threat, she is also a food scientist. Red Car Long Legs is a memoir of her life in California. This tell-all story of her trying to fit into the California mould with the right house, right clothes and right friends, parallels the American dream. While appearing to have everything, including a high profile career with a great deal of exotic travel, she feels driven to find Mr. Right. Details of California dating and exploring the wilds of Latin America abound in this story of exploration and self actualization.Like us on Facebook, https://www.facebook.com/RedCarLongLegshttp://www.jennylyndjames.com
author: Jennylynd James
